duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and design print materials for advertising, including magazine advertising, outdoor billboards, corporate collateral, and store signage
Manage all production aspects of assigned jobs, executing creative design details and performing complex manipulations to graphic images and documents
Collaborate with other designers and production team to ensure final products meet department standards for quality, timelines, and cost-effectiveness
Interview and hire photographers and stylists, and direct shots including coordination of photo details

education_certification.credential: Related degree or formal training, certification, or work experience in graphic design
